data.text:
It's been a few days since Tap Dance City and I 
started chasing our dreams――

choices.text: (Oh? There's a sketchbook on the ground.)
choices.processed: <size=38>(Oh? There's a sketchbook on the ground.)</size>

choices.text: (Oh? There's a sketchbook on the ground.)
choices.processed: <size=38>(Oh? There's a sketchbook on the ground.)</size>

data.processed:
<story>It's been a few days since Tap Dance City and I 
<story>started chasing our dreams――

data.text:
I pick it up and take a look inside. It's full of 
illustrations and comics about races. 
And they look really good, too.
data.processed:
<story>I pick it up and take a look inside. It's full of 
<story>illustrations and comics about races. 
<story>And they look really good, too.

data.text: ――Fantastic!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: ――Fantastic!

data.text:
You can really tell she's putting her heart and soul into the last spurt! 
Their hooves are ripping up the turf and the audience is losing their 
voices from cheering so hard for the battle on the final straight!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>You can really tell she's putting her heart and soul into the last spurt! 
<story>Their hooves are ripping up the turf and the audience is losing their 
<story>voices from cheering so hard for the battle on the final straight!

data.text:
It's awesome, I can really feel the sense of wonder and adventure! 
Hey, did you draw this, Trainer?!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: N-No... Someone must have dropped it.
N-No... Someone must have dropped it.

data.processed:
<story>It's awesome, I can really feel the sense of wonder and adventure! 
<story>Hey, did you draw this, Trainer?!

data.text:
Then it must be from a student! Wow, who knew 
there was someone here who could draw like this?!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Then it must be from a student! Wow, who knew 
<story>there was someone here who could draw like this?!

data.text:
...Let's go find her, Trainer! We'll uncover 
the mystery of the legend who created this!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: You mean, return it to its owner...?

data.processed:
<story>...Let's go find her, Trainer! We'll uncover 
<story>the mystery of the legend who created this!

data.text:
Hmm... "Returning it to its owner" is lacking in impact. 
You gotta spice up the phrasing a bit!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Hmm... "Returning it to its owner" is lacking in impact. 
<story>You gotta spice up the phrasing a bit!

data.text:
How about... This: 
"We're going on a journey to return her lost dreams!"
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>How about... This: 
<story>"We're going on a journey to return her lost dreams!"

data.text:
――And with that, Tap Dance City and I set out 
to find the owner of the sketchbook.
data.processed:
<story>――And with that, Tap Dance City and I set out 
<story>to find the owner of the sketchbook.

data.text:
...Although, there's no name written anywhere. 
This might end up being a bit of a challenge――
data.processed:
<story>...Although, there's no name written anywhere. 
<story>This might end up being a bit of a challenge――

data.text: ――Man, oh man. Still no trace of her.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>――Man, oh man. Still no trace of her.

data.text:
As expected of someone so talented! 
I'm only getting more excited to meet her!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>As expected of someone so talented! 
<story>I'm only getting more excited to meet her!

data.text: ――I'm not... talented at all.
data.processed: <story>――I'm not... talented at all.

data.text:
I look into the direction of that voice, 
and there I see a horsegirl standing there alone.
data.processed:
<story>I look into the direction of that voice, 
<story>and there I see a horsegirl standing there alone.

data.text:
Yes... But I don't want it back. 
Please throw it away...
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Yes... But I don't want it back. 
<story>Please throw it away...

data.text: Why? How could you throw away something so amazing...?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Why? How could you throw away something so amazing...?

data.text:
... 
I already... threw it away myself!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>... 
<story>I already... threw it away myself!

data.text:
You see, I've wanted to be a manga artist even before joining 
Tracen Academy. I've continued to draw in secret ever since.
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>You see, I've wanted to be a manga artist even before joining 
<story>Tracen Academy. I've continued to draw in secret ever since.

data.text:
But... Yesterday, one of my friends saw it and laughed at me... 
That was the last straw for me.
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>But... Yesterday, one of my friends saw it and laughed at me... 
<story>That was the last straw for me.

data.text:
I've had to share my passion with two different dreams, 
and it's been detrimental for both... It's about time I let go 
of what remnants of my old dream I still have.
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>I've had to share my passion with two different dreams, 
<story>and it's been detrimental for both... It's about time I let go 
<story>of what remnants of my old dream I still have.

data.text: ...Mere remnants? No, no, no, no. That's where you're wrong. You ought to hold onto that book!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: ...Mere remnants? No, no, no, no. That's where you're wrong. You ought to hold onto that book!

data.text: ...! What makes you think you can say that to me?!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>...! What makes you think you can say that to me?!

data.text:
I can feel it. I don't know anything about manga, 
but I can feel your passion just by looking at it.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>I can feel it. I don't know anything about manga, 
<story>but I can feel your passion just by looking at it.

data.text: This book, it's a treasure chest full of your passion for epic tales!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>This book, it's a treasure chest full of your passion for epic tales!

data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>...!

data.text:
You must never throw it away. Without it, 
you'll never be able to run again the same way.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>You must never throw it away. Without it, 
<story>you'll never be able to run again the same way.

data.text:
Choosing between dreams... That's merely something 
you made up in your head! Let yourself be guided by both!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Choosing between dreams... That's merely something 
<story>you made up in your head! Let yourself be guided by both!

data.text:
... Haha... 
You make it sound so easy...
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>... Haha... 
<story>You make it sound so easy...

data.text: In the end, she took the sketchbook back from Tap Dance City.
data.processed: <story>In the end, she took the sketchbook back from Tap Dance City.

data.text: And she promised to never throw it away again.
data.processed: <story>And she promised to never throw it away again.

data.text: Look, we managed to return the lost dreams to her after all.
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: The way you described it earlier...
The way you described it earlier...

data.processed: <story>Look, we managed to return the lost dreams to her after all.

data.text:
Ah, you mean the treasure chest full of your passion for epic tales? 
Haha! Well, you've got one too, Trainer.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Ah, you mean the treasure chest full of your passion for epic tales? 
<story>Haha! Well, you've got one too, Trainer.

data.text:
Your notebook in which you write down our training plans! 
It holds our dreams. It's our adventure map!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Your notebook in which you write down our training plans! 
<story>It holds our dreams. It's our adventure map!

data.text:
I just showed her why she should continue her journey. 
I showed her the joy of chasing after adventure, that's all!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>I just showed her why she should continue her journey. 
<story>I showed her the joy of chasing after adventure, that's all!
